Class AvatarItemServlet

  • java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • AvatarItemServlet

        @Autowired
public AvatarItemServlet(com.revature.trial_by_combat.services.AvatarItemService avatarItemService,
                                     com.revature.trial_by_combat.services.AvatarService avatarService,
                                     com.revature.trial_by_combat.services.ItemService itemService)
        Database access dependency injection. AvatarItemService, AvatarService, ItemService Dependency Injection.
        Parameters:
        avatarItemService - calls the Avatar Item Data Access Object to interact with database.
        avatarService - calls the Avatar Data Access Object to interact with database.
        itemService - calls the Item Data Access Object to interact with database.
